siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Paramount Plus‘ new TV and movie release schedule for March 24 – March 30, 2025, includes Basketball Wives (Season 11) and the film Mass. On March 26, Basketball Wives Season 11 drops on Paramount Plus. It features a total of 26 episodes. The reality show focuses on the adventurous lives of a group of female friends who are the wives, ex-wives, girlfriends, or former girlfriends of NBA players. While their life looks perfect on the surface level, having swanky cars, mansions, designer outfits, and jewelry, the reality is a little different. As the series progresses, the ladies talk about the numerous problems they face on a daily basis beyond glamour. Season 11 resumes their rollercoaster journey as they discuss their struggles with each other and the audience. Season 11 boasts of an interesting star cast. This includes Evelyn Lozada, Brooke Bailey, Jennifer Williams, Jac’Eil Duckworth, and Vanessa Rider. The other popular names include Clayanna Warthen, Jackie Christie, and Shaunie Henderson. Also coming out on the same day on Paramount Plus is the 2021 thriller drama Mass. Directed by Fran Kranz, the film showcases Jay and Gail Perry’s son being brutally murdered at a school in a shooting orchestrated by the child of Richard and Linda. Six years after the incident, the four parents decide to talk privately regarding the tragedy. The film opened to positive reviews and has a 7.6/10 rating on IMDb and 95% on Rotten Tomatoes. The film features an interesting star cast. It includes Reed Birney, Ann Dowd, Jason Isaacs, Martha Plimpton, Breeda Wool, and others in key roles. New Paramount Plus releases for March 24 – March 30, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Paramount Plus from March 24 – March 30, 2025. html:
Paramount Plus‘ new TV and movie release schedule for March 24 – March 30, 2025, includes Basketball Wives (Season 11) and the film Mass.

On March 26, Basketball Wives Season 11 drops on Paramount Plus. It features a total of 26 episodes. The reality show focuses on the adventurous lives of a group of female friends who are the wives, ex-wives, girlfriends, or former girlfriends of NBA players. While their life looks perfect on the surface level, having swanky cars, mansions, designer outfits, and jewelry, the reality is a little different. As the series progresses, the ladies talk about the numerous problems they face on a daily basis beyond glamour. Season 11 resumes their rollercoaster journey as they discuss their struggles with each other and the audience.

Season 11 boasts of an interesting star cast. This includes Evelyn Lozada, Brooke Bailey, Jennifer Williams, Jac’Eil Duckworth, and Vanessa Rider. The other popular names include Clayanna Warthen, Jackie Christie, and Shaunie Henderson.

Also coming out on the same day on Paramount Plus is the 2021 thriller drama Mass. Directed by Fran Kranz, the film showcases Jay and Gail Perry’s son being brutally murdered at a school in a shooting orchestrated by the child of Richard and Linda. Six years after the incident, the four parents decide to talk privately regarding the tragedy. The film opened to positive reviews and has a 7.6/10 rating on IMDb and 95% on Rotten Tomatoes.

The film features an interesting star cast. It includes Reed Birney, Ann Dowd, Jason Isaacs, Martha Plimpton, Breeda Wool, and others in key roles.

New Paramount Plus releases for March 24 – March 30, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Paramount Plus from March 24 – March 30, 2025.

March 26

  • Basketball Wives (Season 11)
  • Mass

For more Paramount Plus content, check out the latest update on Landman Season 2. Also, find out whether School Spirits is coming back with another season.
